This product allows you to use it as L-shaped sofa or an extra padded seat at the same time. The deep seats and tool chairs have been provided in case of unexpected guests. name: Executive Chair (FCEC-8)
keywords: Home & décor,Bath,Home appliance,Bedding,Décor,Furniture,Kitchen & dining,Lighting,Laundry&cleaning,Tools, diy & outdoor,Stationery & craft,Media, music & books,Household
description:
• adjustable height
  • supportive head and armrest
  • allows tilt lock in different positions
  • provides maximum comfort

Hydraulic Chair Benefits: To support your body height, it’s essential to use a chair with height adjustment feasibility. Hydraulic chair offers more comfort for the adjustment. The gas lift component of the chair is the reason you can adjust your seat height according to the needs of your body. That's why these kinds of chairs are also suitable for children and different body sizes as well.

Swivel Chair: A chair that swivels is of great use! The swivel feature makes your chair move anywhere you want to! Additionally, the revolving 360 rotation chair allows you to work in different directions without having to shift your chair which makes the chair ideal for multitasking.

Materials: Made with the finest materials (solid wood (mahogany), plywood, foam, synthetic leather, SS frame) which make it strong and long lasting. SS frame ensures robust durability. Synthetic leather is use to clean and maintain. Robust frame wrapped in high quality upholstery indemnifies durability up to 10-12 years if not pierced with sharp objects.

Supportive Backrest & Armrest: During work, it’s important to rest your arms for a while. The high backrest feature supports your back and naturally curved spine helping you to reduce back pain. Armrest allows you to rest your hands during work or in spare times.

Comfortable Seat: Thick padded and soft foam give you a comfy seating experience even if your sit for longer periods. The is wide enough to sit comfortably for anyone since it gives your back and the lower part of body enough support for sitting long hours.

Exclusive Design: Distinctive design and ample space are suitable to sit with coziness. Straight-Backed feature helps you to keep your arms and backbone straight.

name: Exclusive Executive Chair (FCEC 25)
keywords: Home & décor,Bath,Home appliance,Bedding,Décor,Furniture,Kitchen & dining,Lighting,Laundry&cleaning,Tools, diy & outdoor,Stationery & craft,Media, music & books,Household
description:
• adjustable height
  • supportive armrest
  • SS frame ensures high durability
  • allows tilt lock in different positions
  • thick contour cut foam provides maximum comfort
  • unique, attractive & elegant design
  • extremely resilient

Hydraulic Chair Benefits: To support your body height, it’s essential to use a chair with height adjustment feasibility. Hydraulic chair offers more comfort for the adjustment. The gas lift component of the chair is the reason you can adjust your seat height according to the needs of your body. That's why these kinds of chairs are also suitable for children and different body sizes as well.

Swivel Chair: A chair that swivels is of great use! The swivel feature makes your chair move anywhere you want to! Additionally, the revolving 360 rotation chair allows you to work in different directions without having to shift your chair which makes the chair ideal for multitasking.

Materials: Made with the finest materials (solid wood (mahogany), plywood, foam, synthetic leather, SS frame) which make it strong and long lasting. SS frame ensures robust durability. Synthetic leather is use to clean and maintain. Robust frame wrapped in high quality upholstery ensures durability up to 10-12 years if not pierced with sharp objects.

Supportive Backrest & Armrest: During work, it’s important to rest your arms for a while. The high backrest feature supports your back and naturally curved spine helping you to reduce back pain. Armrest allows you to rest your hands during work or in spare times.

Comfortable Seat: Thick padded and soft foam give you a comfy seating experience even if your sit for longer periods. The is wide enough to sit comfortably for anyone since it gives your back and the lower part of body enough support for sitting long hours.

Exclusive Design: Distinctive design and ample space are suitable to sit with coziness. Straight-Backed feature helps you to keep your arms and backbone straight.
